professional_summary: Senior Engineering Leader with 10+ years of experience building scalable distributed systems, data platforms, and leading high-performance engineering teams. Proven track record of architecting and delivering complex software solutions across multiple technology stacks including Python, Go, Java, and C#. Expert in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP), microservices architecture, and data mesh implementations. Successfully led teams of 15+ engineers while maintaining hands-on technical contributions in backend systems, data pipelines, and platform engineering.

experience.description: Lead engineering organization responsible for data platform and infrastructure serving 100M+ users. Manage 15+ engineers across 3 teams while maintaining hands-on technical contributions to critical systems architecture.
key_achievements: Architected and implemented company-wide data mesh platform serving 500+ data products
Led migration from monolithic architecture to microservices, improving system reliability by 99.9%
Built real-time data processing pipelines handling 50TB+ daily using Kafka, Spark, and Kubernetes
Established engineering best practices reducing deployment cycle time from weeks to hours
Mentored 20+ engineers, with 8 promoted to senior roles under my leadership
Designed multi-cloud disaster recovery strategy reducing RTO from 4 hours to 15 minutes
Implemented comprehensive observability stack reducing mean time to resolution by 70%

experience.description: Technical lead for backend platform serving fintech applications. Responsible for system architecture, performance optimization, and technical mentoring of junior engineers.
key_achievements: Designed and built high-throughput transaction processing system handling 1M+ requests per second
Implemented event-sourcing architecture reducing data inconsistency incidents by 95%
Led team of 6 engineers in developing real-time fraud detection system using machine learning
Optimized database queries and caching strategies improving API response times by 80%
Established code review processes and testing standards increasing code coverage to 95%
Built comprehensive CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment failures by 90%

experience.description: Full-stack engineer specializing in data pipeline architecture and analytics platforms. Built scalable ETL systems and data visualization tools for enterprise clients.
key_achievements: Architected distributed ETL pipeline processing 10TB+ daily data from multiple sources
Built real-time analytics dashboard using React and D3.js serving 1000+ concurrent users
Implemented data quality monitoring system reducing data pipeline failures by 60%
Optimized Spark jobs reducing processing time from hours to minutes
Led initiative to migrate legacy systems to cloud-native architecture
Mentored 3 junior engineers in backend development and system design

experience.description: Backend engineer developing enterprise applications and integration services. Worked with multiple technology stacks including .NET, Java, and Python to build scalable business solutions.
key_achievements: Developed microservices-based integration platform connecting 50+ legacy systems
Built REST APIs serving 10M+ requests daily with 99.99% uptime
Implemented automated testing framework reducing manual QA time by 50%
Optimized database performance improving query response times by 70%
Collaborated with product managers to deliver features for 500+ enterprise clients

projects.name: Open Source Data Mesh Framework
projects.description: Created and maintain an open-source framework for implementing data mesh architecture patterns. Used by 50+ companies worldwide.
achievements: Featured in multiple conference talks and technical blogs
Adopted by Fortune 500 companies for production workloads

projects.name: Real-time Analytics Platform
projects.description: Built comprehensive real-time analytics platform for IoT data processing and visualization, capable of processing millions of events per second.
achievements: Processes 10M+ events per second with sub-second latency
Handles petabyte-scale data storage and querying
Deployed across multiple cloud providers with auto-scaling
Featured in Cloud Native Computing Foundation case studies

projects.name: Distributed Systems Learning Platform
projects.description: Educational platform with interactive tutorials and labs for learning distributed systems concepts, used by universities and bootcamps.
achievements: Used by 20+ universities in computer science curricula
Winner of 'Best Educational Tool' at DevEd Conference 2023
